help.title: Partner with Us
help.subtitle: Join our partner network and benefit from diverse collaboration opportunities
help.partnershipFaqSubtitle: Answers to the most common questions about collaboration opportunities
help.partnershipResourcesSubtitle: Everything you need to start a successful partnership with us
help.contactPartnershipSubtitle: We are excited to collaborate with you
help.partnershipGuideDesc: A comprehensive guide explaining different types of partnerships, requirements, and benefits for each type.
help.webinarsDesc: Watch recorded webinars explaining partnership opportunities and how to maximize collaboration benefits.
help.partnershipFormsDesc: Ready-to-download forms to help you apply for partnership and understand terms and conditions.
help.partnerCommunityDesc: Join an exclusive community for partners to exchange experiences and get advice from successful partners.

faq.q1: What types of partnerships are available?
faq.a1: We offer several types of partnerships: perfume brand partnerships, influencer and perfume expert partnerships, e-commerce store partnerships, and educational content partnerships. Each type has special benefits and conditions that suit your needs.
faq.q2: How can I apply for partnership?
faq.a2: You can apply by filling out the partnership form below or contacting us directly. We will review your application within 3-5 business days and respond with details and next steps.
faq.a3: Requirements vary by partnership type. Generally, we look for partners who share our vision of providing exceptional perfume experiences, have a good market reputation, and commitment to high quality standards.
faq.q4: What benefits do I get as a partner?
faq.a4: As a partner you will get: competitive commissions, dedicated marketing support, advanced analytics tools, continuous technical support, and access to our wide customer base. We also provide training programs to ensure partnership success.
faq.a5: No, joining the partnership program is completely free. We believe in mutually beneficial partnerships and focus on achieving shared success rather than imposing upfront fees.

imageSearch.title: Image Search
imageSearch.subtitle: Use AI to identify perfumes through bottle or brand images
imageSearch.aiAnalysisDesc: Upload an image of the perfume bottle and our system will identify it and provide detailed information
imageSearch.dragDropText: Drag and drop perfume image here
imageSearch.uploadDesc: You can upload an image of the perfume bottle or brand logo and we will identify it and provide detailed information
imageSearch.step1Desc: The system analyzes the bottle shape and design and compares it with a database containing more than 5000 perfumes
imageSearch.step2Desc: Uses OCR technology to recognize texts and logos on the bottle to identify the brand and name
imageSearch.step3Desc: Analyzes bottle colors and design to help determine perfume type and potential notes
imageSearch.step4Desc: Based on analysis results, the system suggests similar perfumes you might like
imageSearch.accuracyDesc: Our system can recognize more than 5000 perfumes from various international and Arabic brands with up to 98% accuracy
imageSearch.noSearchHistoryDesc: Upload a perfume image to start searching
imageSearch.errorLoadingHistory: Error occurred while loading search history
imageSearch.analysisError: Error occurred during image analysis. Please try again.
imageSearch.uploadError: Error occurred during image upload. Please try again.
imageSearch.creditsExhaustedDesc: You have used all available searches in your free plan this month
imageSearch.premiumFeatures: 💡 Tip: With premium plan you get:

sauvage.name: Sauvage
sauvage.description: A fresh and attractive men's fragrance that combines strength and elegance. Features a refreshing and appealing scent that lasts long

bleuDeChanel.name: Bleu de Chanel
bleuDeChanel.description: An elegant and modern men's fragrance that reflects the spirit of the contemporary man. Perfect blend of freshness and warmth

oudIspahan.name: Oud Ispahan
oudIspahan.description: A luxurious oriental fragrance with natural oud of the finest quality. A fragrant masterpiece that combines heritage and modernity

laVieEstBelle.name: La Vie Est Belle
laVieEstBelle.description: A sweet floral women's fragrance that celebrates the beauty of life. A happy and bright scent that spreads joy

tomFordOudWood.name: Tom Ford Oud Wood
tomFordOudWood.description: A luxurious woody fragrance with oud and sandalwood. A complex and elegant composition suitable for luxury fragrance lovers

cocoMademoiselle.name: Coco Mademoiselle
cocoMademoiselle.description: An elegant oriental women's fragrance that reflects the personality of a strong and independent woman. A timeless classic

acquaDiGio.name: Acqua di Gio
acquaDiGio.description: A fresh and aquatic men's fragrance that evokes the Mediterranean sea breeze. A timeless classic that never ages

blackOpium.name: Black Opium
blackOpium.description: An attractive oriental women's fragrance with coffee and vanilla notes. Addictive and sensually stimulating

creedAventus.name: Creed Aventus
creedAventus.description: A luxurious and powerful men's fragrance that symbolizes success and strength. A legend in the world of perfumes

goodGirl.name: Good Girl
goodGirl.description: A modern floral women's fragrance that combines sweetness and boldness. An intriguing dual personality
